officialTitle: A Multicenter, Observational Cohort to Study the Characteristics of Individuals Asking for Pre-exposure Prophylaxis (PrEP) and the Incidence of HIV and Other Sexually Transmitted Infections: 'The SwissPrEPared Study'

protocolDocument.label: Study Protocol and Statistical Analysis Plan

eligibilityCriteria.criteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Participation in the SwissPrEPared program
* Aged â‰¥16 years
* HIV negative

Exclusion Criteria:

* Individuals unable to follow program procedures (e.g. language barriers, mental or psychiatric disorders)

primary.measure: Number of individuals asking for PrEP
primary.description: Number of individuals asking for PrEP

primary.measure: Proportion of individuals qualifying for PrEP according to current guidelines
primary.description: Proportion of individuals qualifying for PrEP according to current guidelines

primary.measure: Mode of drug supply (pharmacy versus online)
primary.description: Mode of drug supply (pharmacy versus online)
Adherence rates to programme assessed via lost to follow-up and dropouts
Adherence rates to PrEP measured via self-report questionnaire

primary.measure: Prevalence of other STIs (syphilis, hepatitis B, hepatitis C, gonorrhoea, chlamydia, mycoplasma genitalium)
primary.description: Prevalence of other STIs (syphilis, hepatitis B, hepatitis C, gonorrhoea, chlamydia, mycoplasma genitalium)

primary.measure: Incidence of other STIs (syphilis, hepatitis B, hepatitis C, gonorrhoea, chlamydia, mycoplasma genitalium)
primary.description: Incidence of other STIs (syphilis, hepatitis B, hepatitis C, gonorrhoea, chlamydia, mycoplasma genitalium)
